title: Client patching very slowly
body:
Normally I download patches at 1.2-2.2 mpbs but despite my best efforts this morning I'm stuck at around 120-250 kbps :(
My speedtest results are right on point.  I've toggled p2p transfer on and back off and no difference either way.

replies.body: I'm glad everything is okay now!  There may have been a hiccup with your ISP, but it wouldn't hurt to check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case something may be going wonky with your connection.  Hope that helps!
Well, either I fixed it with port forwarding or it cleared itself up.  I've been crawling along since 8AM and no at 9:20AM its back to near normal speeds...so frustrating.
